input.sentences: i went for a walk one evening .
i passed by some old buildings .
there were many flags on the houses .
i eventually turned back and went home .
output.sentences: I like to walk in the evening after the temp cools down.
I always enjoy looking at the various plants as I walk.
During my walk I pass by many buildings.
Many houses have interesting colorful flags flying.
Eventually I return home after looking at the interesting architecture.
